title: Wholly Addicted to You
description: Fandom: Kingdom HeartsRelationship: Riku/Sora--------------------------------------------------When Sora finds a new neighbour moving in next door: neither does he expect to find a hole in his bathroom wall the next morning nor an odd attraction to who he sees through it. Will love blossom or will it be sealed like the hole in the wall?
author: FruchiSeka
